## AuthToolkit interface

A tool set defining an outcome of Auth interceptor for incoming request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AuthToolkit 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [authenticated](./opensearch-dashboards.authtoolkit.authenticated.md) | (data?: [AuthResultParams](./opensearch-dashboards.authresultparams.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [AuthResult](./opensearch-dashboards.authresult.md) | Authentication is successful with given credentials, allow request to pass through |
|  [notHandled](./opensearch-dashboards.authtoolkit.nothandled.md) | () =&gt; [AuthResult](./opensearch-dashboards.authresult.md) | User has no credentials. Allows user to access a resource when authRequired: 'optional' Rejects a request when authRequired: true |
|  [redirected](./opensearch-dashboards.authtoolkit.redirected.md) | (headers: { location: string; } &amp; [ResponseHeaders](./opensearch-dashboards.responseheaders.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [AuthResult](./opensearch-dashboards.authresult.md) | Redirects user to another location to complete authentication when authRequired: true Allows user to access a resource without redirection when authRequired: 'optional' |
